participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Curious and humorous, Emma enjoys making light of serious situations.
participant_1.background: I'm 13 years old. I ride the bus to school. I'm on the soccer team. My brother is older than me.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and unconventional, George has a unique perspective on life.
participant_2.background: My favorite food is papaya. I married a supermodel from Italy. I have zero family that I'm close to. I am a bee farmer. My name is George.

content.text: I am the youngest, but my brother is the youngest in my brother
so you are the youngest... sister?
Yes, i'm. my sister is in my family
how many brothers and sisters do you have?
I have three sisters and they're 30 pairs of 12 children
what do you do in life? my wife is a supermodel from Italy
I work at a hospital in the basement, there's no italian
what? in the basement? you mean the morgue???
I am in the morgue, i am in a morgue apartment.
that must be very scary! I work with bees but it/s better than working with dead people
I bet they are, i am allergic to bees
I am allergic to peanuts, so i have to it in the whole life
which country do you live in?
I live in the south, florida
must be hot there this time of year
Yeah it is a good one
